590480.name: Slash It 2 - Elexive Exclusive Edition
590480.description:
This DLC includes 6 new game modes, with their Leaderboard, High Scores ,Game UI and new Effects!
Slash it 2 - Elexive Exclusive Edition will make the "Slash it 2" game display a new UI bar where you can chose between the original game modes (Clasic mode) and this downloaded DLC (Elexive Exclusive mode).

Play to the beat of the following new songs that are included with the DLC:
Elexive - Air Killer
Elexive - Bloody Pumpkin
Elexive - High In The Sky
Elexive - Keep Going
Elexive - Powerbreak
Elexive - Zero
590480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
